description_zh: 知乎是一个中文互联网上的知识分享社区，以“可信赖的问答社区”为定位，用户可以通过提问、回答、评论等方式进行知识互动和分享。
description_en: Zhihu is a knowledge-sharing community on the Chinese Internet, positioning itself as a reliable Q&A community. Users can engage in knowledge interaction and sharing through methods such as asking questions, providing answers, and leaving comments.
rating_zh: 可以发帖推广或者在其他相关问答下进行回答，注意包含一些长尾关键词的放置。
rating_en: You can post promotional content or answer questions in other relevant Q&A sections. Make sure to include some long-tail keywords.
